name: ULoadingScreenSettings
doc: Settings for the Loading Screen system

LoadingScreenWidget: The widget to display for the loading screen
LoadingScreenZOrder: The Z-order to use when adding the loading screen widget to the viewport
HoldLoadingScreenAdditionalSecs: How long to hold the loading screen up after other loading finishes (to allow texture streaming)
HoldLoadingScreenAdditionalSecsEvenInEdi: Should we hold the loading screen for texture streaming even in the editor?
ForceTickLoadingScreenEvenInEditor: Should we force tick the loading screen even in the editor?
LogLoadingScreenHeartbeatInterval: How often to log why the loading screen is still up (0 = never)
LoadingScreenHeartbeatHangDuration: How long before we consider the loading screen hung and trigger the hang detector
